DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of an online virtual intervention in optimizing adherence to antiretroviral medication intake among Persons Living with HIV (PLHIV).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Tailored Virtual Intervention to Empower Persons Living With HIV for Therapy Self-management
DOC.criteria: have to be under ART for at least six monthsÂ¸ have internet access be pregnant active IV drug user actual diagnosis of psychiatric health problem
